dc:title: The Race of Heroes and Saints
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Discusses the Californian migrant workers exploitation by large corporations. Describes the condition of the migrant worker and those people who are trying to better it. Condemns the large landowners for denying the migrant worker property that makes him responsible and free.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 169 1953-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
